concept.title: Attach raster image dialog box
concept.shortdesc: The Attach Image Raster dialog box allows you to attach raster images to the drawing.

section.title: Help
section.p: Opens the Bricsys Help article about the IMAGEATTACH command.

section.title: Name
section.p: Specifies the name of the file to attach.

section.title: Browse
section.p: Opens the Select Image File dialog box to allow you to choose a different raster file.

section.title: Path
section.p: Displays the path of the image file.

section.title: Path type
section.p: Specifies how much of the path is stored.

dlentry.dd: Stores the full path to the image file as an absolute reference such as: C:\foldername\imagename.jpg

Stores the path from the drawing’s location to the image’s location. For example: ..\foldername\imagename.jpg. The .. refers to the folder above the current one. The drawing must be saved before you can use this option.
Strips the drive and folder names, leaving just the image file name such as imagename.jpg.

section.title: Geocoding Information
section.p: Position files or world files have an extension that depends on what kind of image file they are associated with.

dlentry.dd:
Toggles use of a position file, which specifies the size, location and rotation of the image file.
Yes: uses a position file
No: does not use a position file.
Displays the path of the position file.
Opens the Select Image Position File dialog box.

section.title: Insertion Point
section.p: Specifies the location of the image’s lower left corner.

dlentry.dd:
Determines how you specify the insertion point.
On: specify the insertion point in the drawing after the dialog box is closed.
Off: specify the insertion point in the dialog box using the X, Y and Z fields.
Specifies the x, y, and z coordinates for the image’s insertion point.

section.title: Scale
section.p: Specifies the size of the image.

dlentry.dd:
Determines how you specify the scale factor.
On: specify the scale factors in the drawing after the dialog box is closed.
Off: specify the scale factors in the dialog box using the X and Y fields.
Specifies the scale factors along the X and Y axes.
Makes the Y scale factor equal to X.

section.title: Rotation
section.p: Specifies the rotation angle of the image.

dlentry.dd:
Determines how you specify the rotation angle.
On: specify the rotation angle in the drawing after the dialog box is closed.
Off: specify the angle in the dialog box using the Angle field.

section.title: Angle
section.p: Specifies the rotation angle of the image about the insertion point. Positive angles rotate the image counterclockwise. Negative angles rotate the image clockwise. Use 0 to keep the image at its original orientation.
